rule_sets.heading: Chapter 1
rule_sets.subdivision: Live animals.

rules.rule: All the animals of [chapter 1](/chapters/01) are wholly obtained.

rule_sets.heading: Chapter 2
rule_sets.subdivision: Meat and edible meat offal.

rules.rule: Manufacture in which all the meat and edible meat offal used are wholly obtained.

rule_sets.heading: ex Chapter 3
rule_sets.subdivision: Fish and crustaceans, molluscs and other aquatic invertebrates

rules.rule: All fish and crustaceans, molluscs and other aquatic invertebrates are wholly obtained.

rule_sets.subdivision: Fish fillets and other fish meat (whether or not minced), fresh, chilled or frozen

rules.rule: Manufacture in which all the materials of [chapter 3](/chapters/03) used are wholly obtained.

rule_sets.subdivision: Fish, dried, salted or in brine; smoked fish, whether or not cooked before or during the smoking process; flours, meals and pellets of fish, fit for human consumption

rules.rule: Manufacture in which all the materials of [chapter 3](/chapters/03) used are wholly obtained.

rule_sets.heading: ex 0306
rule_sets.subdivision: Crustaceans, whether in shell or not, dried, salted or in brine; smoked crustaceans, whether in shell or not, whether or not cooked before or during the smoking process; crustaceans, in shell, cooked by steaming or by boiling in water, whether or not chilled, frozen, dried, salted or in brine; flours, meals and pellets of crustaceans, fit for human consumption

rules.rule: Manufacture in which all the materials of [chapter 3](/chapters/03) used are wholly obtained.

rule_sets.heading: ex 0307
rule_sets.subdivision: Molluscs, whether in shell or not, dried, salted or in brine; smoked molluscs, whether in shell or not, whether or not cooked before or during the smoking process; flours, meals and pellets of molluscs, fit for human consumption; and

rules.rule: Manufacture in which all the materials of [chapter 3](/chapters/03) used are wholly obtained.

rule_sets.heading: ex 0308
rule_sets.subdivision: Aquatic invertebrates other than crustaceans and molluscs, dried salted or in brine; smoked aquatic invertebrates other than crustaceans and molluscs, whether or not cooked before or during the smoking process; flours, meals and pellets of aquatic invertebrates other than crustaceans and molluscs, fit for human consumption

rules.rule: Manufacture in which all the materials of [chapter 3](/chapters/03) used are wholly obtained.

rule_sets.heading: ex Chapter 4
rule_sets.subdivision: Dairy produce; birds' eggs; edible products of animal origin, not elsewhere specified or included

rules.rule:
Manufacture in which: 

- all the materials of [chapter 4](/chapters/04) used are wholly obtained; *and* 

- the weight of sugar used does not exceed **20%** of the weight of the final product.

rule_sets.subdivision: Natural honey.

rules.rule: Manufacture in which all the natural honey used is wholly obtained.

rule_sets.heading: ex Chapter 5
rule_sets.subdivision: Products of animal origin, not elsewhere specified or included

rules.rule: Manufacture from materials of any heading.

rule_sets.heading: ex 051191
rule_sets.subdivision: Inedible fish eggs and roes.

rules.rule: All the eggs and roes are wholly obtained.

rule_sets.heading: Chapter 6
rule_sets.subdivision: Live trees and other plants; bulbs, roots and the like; cut flowers and ornamental foliage.

rules.rule: Manufacture in which all the materials of [chapter 6](/chapters/06) used are wholly obtained.

rule_sets.heading: Chapter 7
rule_sets.subdivision: Edible vegetables and certain roots and tubers.

rules.rule: Manufacture in which all the materials of [chapter 7](/chapters/07) used are wholly obtained.

rule_sets.heading: Chapter 8
rule_sets.subdivision: Edible fruit and nuts; peel of citrus fruits or melons.

rules.rule:
Manufacture in which: 

- all the fruit, nuts and peels of citrus fruits or melons of [chapter 8](/chapters/08) used are wholly obtained; *and* 

- the weight of sugar used does not exceed **20%** of the weight of the final product.

rule_sets.heading: Chapter 9
rule_sets.subdivision: Coffee, tea, maté and spices.

rules.rule: Manufacture from materials of any heading.

rule_sets.heading: Chapter 10
rule_sets.subdivision: Cereals.

rules.rule: Manufacture in which all the materials of [chapter 10](/chapters/10) used are wholly obtained.

rule_sets.heading: Chapter 11
rule_sets.subdivision: Products of the milling industry; malt; starches; inulin; wheat gluten.

rules.rule: Manufacture in which all the materials of [chapter 10](/chapters/10) and [chapter 11](/chapters/11) , headings 0701, 071410 and 2303, and sub-heading 071010 used are wholly obtained.

rule_sets.heading: Chapter 12
rule_sets.subdivision: Oil seeds and oleaginous fruits; miscellaneous grains, seeds and fruit; industrial or medicinal plants; straw and fodder.

rules.rule: Manufacture from materials of any heading, except that of the product.

rule_sets.heading: Chapter 13
rule_sets.subdivision: Lac; gums, resins and other vegetable saps and extracts.

rules.rule: Manufacture from materials of any heading, in which the weight of sugar used does not exceed **20%** of the weight of the final product.

rule_sets.heading: Chapter 14
rule_sets.subdivision: Vegetable plaiting materials; vegetable products not elsewhere specified or included.

rules.rule: Manufacture from materials of any heading.

rule_sets.heading: ex Chapter 15
rule_sets.subdivision: Animal or vegetable fats and oils and their cleavage products; prepared edible fats; animal or vegetable waxes

rules.rule: Manufacture from materials of any subheading, except that of the product.

rule_sets.subdivision: Olive oil and its fractions

rules.rule: Manufacture in which all the vegetable materials used are wholly obtained.

rule_sets.subdivision: Olive oil and its fractions

rules.rule: Manufacture in which all the vegetable materials used are wholly obtained.

rule_sets.subdivision:
animal or vegetable fats and oils and their fractions, partly or wholly hydrogenated, inter-esterified, re-esterified or elaidinised, whether or not refined, but not further prepared;

margarine; edible mixtures or preparations of animal or vegetable fats or oils or of fractions of different fats or oils of this Chapter, other than edible fats or oils or their fractions of heading 1516; and

rules.rule: Manufacture from materials of any heading, except that of the product.

rule_sets.subdivision:
animal or vegetable fats and oils and their fractions, partly or wholly hydrogenated, inter-esterified, re-esterified or elaidinised, whether or not refined, but not further prepared;

margarine; edible mixtures or preparations of animal or vegetable fats or oils or of fractions of different fats or oils of this Chapter, other than edible fats or oils or their fractions of heading 1516; and

rules.rule: Manufacture from materials of any heading, except that of the product.

rule_sets.subdivision: Glycerol.

rules.rule: Manufacture from materials of any heading.

rule_sets.heading: Chapter 16
rule_sets.subdivision: Preparations of meat, of fish or of crustaceans, molluscs or other aquatic invertebrates.

rules.rule: Manufacture in which all the materials of chapters 2, 3 and 16 used are wholly obtained.

rule_sets.heading: Chapter 16
rule_sets.subdivision: Preparations of meat, of fish or of crustaceans, molluscs or other aquatic invertebrates.

rules.rule: Manufacture in which all the materials of chapters 2, 3 and 16 used are wholly obtained.

rule_sets.heading: ex Chapter 17
rule_sets.subdivision: Sugars and sugar confectionery

rules.rule: Manufacture from materials of any heading, except that of the product.

rule_sets.subdivision: Other sugars, including chemically pure lactose, maltose, glucose and fructose, in solid form; sugar syrups not containing added flavouring or colouring matter; artificial honey, whether or not mixed with natural honey; caramel; and

rules.rule: Manufacture from materials of any heading, except that of the product, in which the weight of the materials of headings 1101 to 1108, 1701 and 1703 used does not exceed **30%** of the weight of the final product.

rule_sets.subdivision: Sugar confectionery (including white chocolate), not containing cocoa

rules.rule:
Manufacture from materials of any heading, except that of the product, in which: 

- the individual weight of the materials of [chapter 4](/chapters/04) used does not exceed **20%** of the weight of the final product; 

- the individual weight of sugar used does not exceed **40%** of the weight of the final products; *and* 

- the total combined weight of sugar and the materials of [chapter 4](/chapters/04) used does not exceed **50%** of the weight of the final product.

rule_sets.heading: Chapter 18
rule_sets.subdivision: Cocoa and cocoa preparations.

rules.rule:
Manufacture from materials of any heading, except that of the product, in which 

- the individual weight of sugar and of the materials of [chapter 4](/chapters/04) used does not exceed **40%** of the weight of the final product; *and* 

- the total combined weight of sugar and the materials of [chapter 4](/chapters/04) used does not exceed **60%** of the weight of the final product.

rule_sets.heading: Chapter 19
rule_sets.subdivision: Preparations of cereals, flour, starch or milk; pastrycooks' products.

class: (CTH AND (MAXWEIGHT AND MAXWEIGHT AND MAXWEIGHT AND MAXWEIGHT AND MAXWEIGHT))

rule_sets.heading: ex Chapter 20
rule_sets.subdivision: Preparations of vegetables, fruit, nuts or other parts of plants

rules.rule: Manufacture from materials of any heading, except that of the product, in which the weight of sugar used does not exceed **20%** of the weight of the final product.

rule_sets.subdivision: Tomatoes, mushrooms and truffles prepared or preserved otherwise than by vinegar of acetic acid.

rules.rule: Manufacture in which all the materials of [chapter 7](/chapters/07) used are wholly obtained.

rule_sets.subdivision: Tomatoes, mushrooms and truffles prepared or preserved otherwise than by vinegar of acetic acid.

rules.rule: Manufacture in which all the materials of [chapter 7](/chapters/07) used are wholly obtained.

rule_sets.heading: ex Chapter 21
rule_sets.subdivision: Miscellaneous edible preparations

rules.rule:
Manufacture from materials of any heading, except that of the product, in which: 

- the individual weight of the materials of [chapter 4](/chapters/04) used does not exceed **20%** of the weight of the final product; 

- the individual weight of sugar used does not exceed **40%** of the weight of the final products; *and* 

- the total combined weight of sugar and the materials of [chapter 4](/chapters/04) used does not exceed **50%** of the weight of the final product.

rule_sets.subdivision: • sauces and preparations therefore; mixed condiments and mixed seasonings; and

rules.rule: Manufacture from materials of any heading, except that of the product. However, mustard flour or meal or prepared mustard may be used.

rule_sets.subdivision: • mustard flour and meal and prepared mustard

rules.rule: Manufacture from materials of any heading.

rule_sets.heading: Chapter 22
rule_sets.subdivision: Beverages, spirits and vinegar.

rules.rule:
Manufacture from materials of any heading, except that of the product and headings 2207 and 2208, in which: 

- all the materials of sub-headings 080610, 200961, 200969 used are wholly obtained; *and* 

- the individual weight of sugar and of the materials of [chapter 4](/chapters/04) used does not exceed **20%** of the weight of the final product.

rule_sets.heading: ex Chapter 23
rule_sets.subdivision: Residues and waste from the food industries; prepared animal fodder

rules.rule: Manufacture from materials of any heading, except that of the product.

rule_sets.subdivision: Residues of starch manufacture; and

rules.rule: Manufacture from materials of any heading, except that of the product, in which the weight of the materials of [chapter 10](/chapters/10) used does not exceed **20%** of the weight of the final product.

rule_sets.heading: ex 2303
rule_sets.subdivision: Residues of starch manufacture; and

rules.rule: Manufacture from materials of any heading, except that of the product, in which the weight of the materials of [chapter 10](/chapters/10) used does not exceed **20%** of the weight of the final product.

rule_sets.subdivision: Preparations of a kind used in animal feeding.

class: (CTH AND (WO AND MAXWEIGHT AND MAXWEIGHT AND MAXWEIGHT AND MAXWEIGHT))

rule_sets.subdivision: Unmanufactured tobacco; tobacco refuse; and

rules.rule: All unmanufactured tobacco and tobacco refuse of [chapter 24](/chapters/24) is wholly obtained.

rule_sets.heading: ex Chapter 24
rule_sets.subdivision: Tobacco and manufactured tobacco substitutes

rules.rule: Manufacture from materials of any heading in which the weight of materials of [chapter 24](/chapters/24) used does not exceed **30%** of the total weight of materials of [chapter 24](/chapters/24) used.

rule_sets.heading: ex Chapter 24
rule_sets.subdivision: Tobacco and manufactured tobacco substitutes

rules.rule: Manufacture from materials of any heading in which the weight of materials of [chapter 24](/chapters/24) used does not exceed **30%** of the total weight of materials of [chapter 24](/chapters/24) used.

rule_sets.heading: ex 2402
rule_sets.subdivision: Cigarettes of tobacco or of tobacco substitutes.

rules.rule: Manufacture from materials of any heading except that of the product and of smoking tobacco of subheading 240319 in which at least **10%** by weight of all materials of [chapter 24](/chapters/24) used is wholly obtained unmanufactured tobacco or tobacco refuse of heading 2401.

rule_sets.heading: ex Chapter 25
rule_sets.subdivision: Salt; sulphur; earths and stone; plastering materials, lime and cement; except for:

rules.rule: Manufacture from materials of any heading, except that of the product

rule_sets.heading: ex 2519
rule_sets.subdivision: Crushed natural magnesium carbonate (magnesite), in hermetically-sealed containers, and magnesium oxide, whether or not pure, other than fused magnesia or dead-burned (sintered) magnesia.

rules.rule: Manufacture from materials of any heading, except that of the product. However, natural magnesium carbonate (magnesite) may be used.

rule_sets.heading: Chapter 26
rule_sets.subdivision: Ores, slag and ash.

rules.rule: Manufacture from materials of any heading, except that of the product.

rule_sets.heading: ex Chapter 27
rule_sets.subdivision: Mineral fuels, mineral oils and products of their distillation; bituminous substances; mineral waxes

rule_sets.heading: ex 2707
rule_sets.subdivision: Oils in which the weight of the aromatic constituents exceeds that of the non-aromatic constituents, being oils similar to mineral oils obtained by distillation of high temperature coal tar, of which more than 65 % by volume distils at a temperature of up to 250°C (including mixtures of petroleum spirit and benzole), for use as power or heating fuels.

rules.rule: Operations of refining or one or more specific process(es)

rule_sets.subdivision: Petroleum oils and oils obtained from bituminous materials, other than crude; preparations not elsewhere specified or included, containing by weight 70 % or more of petroleum oils or of oils obtained from bituminous materials, these oils being the basic constituents of the preparations; waste oils

rules.rule: Operations of refining or one or more specific process(es)

rules.rule: Operations of refining or one or more specific process(es)

rules.rule: Operations of refining or one or more specific process(es)

rule_sets.subdivision: Petroleum coke, petroleum bitumen and other residues of petroleum oils or of oils obtained from bituminous materials.

rules.rule: Operations of refining or one or more specific process(es)

rule_sets.subdivision: Inorganic chemicals; organic or inorganic compounds of precious metals, of rare-earth metals, of radioactive elements or of isotopes.

rules.rule: Manufacture from materials of any heading, except that of the product. However, materials of the same heading as the product may be used, provided that their total value does not exceed **20%** of the ex-works price of the product

rule_sets.heading: Chapter 29
rule_sets.subdivision: Organic chemicals.

rules.rule: Manufacture from materials of any heading, except that of the product. However, materials of the same heading as the product may be used, provided that their total value does not exceed **20%** of the ex-works price of the product

rule_sets.subdivision: Pharmaceutical products.

rules.rule: Manufacture from materials of any heading.

rule_sets.heading: Chapter 31

rules.rule: Manufacture from materials of any heading, except that of the product. However, materials of the same heading as the product may be used, provided that their total value does not exceed **20%** of the ex-works price of the product

rule_sets.heading: ex 3404
rule_sets.subdivision:
Artificial waxes and prepared waxes:

  • with a basis of paraffin, petroleum waxes, waxes obtained from bituminous minerals, slack wax or scale wax.

rules.rule: Manufacture from materials of any heading, except that of the product, in which the value of all the materials used does not exceed **50%** of the ex-works price of the product.

rule_sets.subdivision: Prepared glues and other prepared adhesives, not elsewhere specified or included; products suitable for use as glues or adhesives, put up for retail sale as glues or adhesives, not exceeding a net weight of 1 kg.

rules.rule: Each item in the set must satisfy the rule which would apply to it if it were not included in the set. However, non-originating articles may be incorporated, provided that their total value does not exceed **15%** of the ex-works price of the set.
class: (SET TOLERANCE (MAY BE USED SET RESTRICTION MAXNOM))
